text: As Life & Style exclusively reported, Kate Middleton is pregnant with twins, but don't expect the royal — who loves to coordinate her kids'clothes — to dress her babies exactly alike. A palace source reveals the 35 - year - old doesn't want her offspring lumped together. ` ` [ She wants the twins to ] be seen as individuals and allowed to develop their own personalities,'' the source shares. And, like she did with Prince George, 4, and Princess Charlotte, 2, Kate is keeping the gender ( s ) under wraps, but those closest to her say she's having identical girls.
